      • getMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod​(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                                 java.lang.String sMethod,
                                                 java.lang.Class<?>... aoParamTypes)
        Searches (ignoring case) for a match among public methods by their names and parameters types.
        The scope for the search is the class and its superclasses.

        This method instead of throwing an exception, returns silently null because throwing exceptions is CPU expensive.

        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to search into.
        sMethod - Method name (case is ignored).
        aoParamTypes - The parameters the method receives (if any). Can be null or empty.
        Returns:
        The method or null if passed method with passed arguments does not exists.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if passed method name is empty.

      • newInstance

        public static <T> T newInstance​(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                java.lang.Object... args)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Dynamically creates an new instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type to be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - Type class to be returned.
        args - Real arguments to pass to the constructor.
        Returns:
        A new instance for passed URI.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

      • newInstance

        public static <T> T newInstance​(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                java.lang.String sFullClassName,
                                java.lang.String... asURIs)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Dynamically creates an new instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type to be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - Type class to be returned.
        asURIs - One or more URIs to be dynamically loaded.
        sFullClassName - Full class name.
        Returns:
        A new instance for passed URI.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • newInstance

        public static <T> T newInstance​(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                java.lang.String sFullClassName,
                                java.lang.String[] asURIs,
                                java.lang.Class[] formalArgs,
                                java.lang.Object... realArgs)
                         throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        Dynamically creates an new instance.

        Only URIs (JARs) that are not already loaded has to be included here.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Type to be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - Type class to be returned.
        asURIs - One or more URIs to be dynamically loaded.
        sFullClassName - Full class name.
        formalArgs - Constructor formal parameters or null to use the zero argument constructor.
        realArgs - Constructor real parameters or null to use the zero argument constructor.
        Returns:
        A new instance for passed URI.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • setFiledValue

        public static void setFiledValue​(java.lang.Object classInstance,
                                 java.lang.String fieldName,
                                 java.lang.Object newValue)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Use reflection to change value of any instance field.
        Parameters:
        classInstance - An Object instance.
        fieldName - The name of a field in the class instantiated by classInstancee
        newValue - The value you want the field to be set to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException

        Parameters:
